BRANCH.COMMENT: Check for package name starting with LXK and not equals to LXKEnterprise

INVOKE.COMMENT: Check current WriteACL assigned to this package

BRANCH.COMMENT: check for ACL's other than expected

MAP.COMMENT: Map the name of the package for which Write ACL has been changed

Values.value: Write ACL for %nsName% has been changed to %expectedWriteACL%.
